TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewSelectEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 "选择 " 按钮 (按钮 `CommandName` 设置为 "select" ) ，但在 控件处理选择操作之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消选择操作。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递给事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定用户选择的行的索引，并指示应取消选择操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消选择操作，请将 对象的属性设置 为 `true` 。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 当用户选择姓氏为白色的作者时，如何使用传递给事件处理方法的对象取消控件的选择操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the select operation of a control when the user selects an author with the last name White. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`newSelectedIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `newSelectedIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中选择的新行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the new row to select in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中选择的新行的索引。

span.span: The index of the new row to select in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 事件发生在 控件执行选择操作之前发生，因此 不能使用控件的属性来确定用户选择的新行的索引。Because the event occurs before the control performs the select operation, the property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the new row selected by the user. 属性仍包含之前所选行的索引。The property still contains the index of the previously selected row. 若要确定用户选择的新行的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of the new row selected by the user, use the property. 你还可以使用此属性，通过将用户设置为其他值来以编程方式重写用户选择的行索引。You can also use this property to programmatically override the row index selected by the user by setting it to another value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定用户选择的行的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/CS/gridviewselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSelect/VB/gridviewselectvb.aspx#1)]
